root.name: Golgo 13: ÅŒkami no Su
root.description: A sequel to 1983 release Golgo 13: Moretti Ichizoku Zansatsu Jiken, this is the second computer game in the Golgo 13 media franchise of manga, anime, films, and games, starring the titular assassin/hitman Golgo 13. The first-person adventure gameplay is similar to its predecessor. This time the plot revolves around Neo-Nazis, which occasionally make an appearance in the original manga series. The goal is to infiltrate the Neo-Nazi headquarters, the Wolf Schanze ("Wolf's Lair"), and assassinate its leader. The Nazi plotline would later feature prominently in Golgo 13: Top Secret Episode.
